subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
organizations: National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: The three-time Kentucky Derby-winning jockey Calvin Borel and the horses Housebuster, Invasor, Lure, McDynamo and Tuscalee were elected to the National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame.
snippet: The three-time Kentucky Derby-winning jockey Calvin Borel and the horses Housebuster, Invasor, Lure, McDynamo and Tuscalee were elected to the National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame.
